DataElement.preferredName: OARS Multidimensional Functional Assessment IADL Questionnaire Prepare Your Meals Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's response to a question about their ability to prepare their own meals.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: OARS Multidimensional Functional Assessment IADL Questionnaire Prepare Your Meals
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire that seeks information both on a person's level of functioning and on their need and utilization of services._A section of the Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire (OMFAQ) that seeks information about a person's functional ability to conduct the complex activities of daily living that allow for independent living within a community._A question about whether an individual is able to prepare meals for themselves.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire that seeks information both on a person's level of functioning and on their need and utilization of services.

Concepts.longName: Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire that seeks information both on a person's level of functioning and on their need and utilization of services.

Property.preferredName: Instrumental Activities of Daily Living Prepare Your Meals
Property.preferredDefinition: A section of the Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire (OMFAQ) that seeks information about a person's functional ability to conduct the complex activities of daily living that allow for independent living within a community.:A question about whether an individual is able to prepare meals for themselves.

Concepts.definition: A section of the Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire (OMFAQ) that seeks information about a person's functional ability to conduct the complex activities of daily living that allow for independent living within a community.
A question about whether an individual is able to prepare meals for themselves.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: are you completely unable to prepare any meals?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: are you completely unable to prepare any meals?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is completely unable to do something.: A question about whether an individual is able to prepare meals for themselves.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is completely unable to do something.
A question about whether an individual is able to prepare meals for themselves.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: with some help (can prepare some things but unable to cook full meals yourself)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: with some help (can prepare some things but unable to cook full meals yourself)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something only with assistance.: A question about whether an individual is able to prepare meals for themselves.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something only with assistance.
A question about whether an individual is able to prepare meals for themselves.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: without help (plan and cook full meals yourself)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: without help (plan and cook full meals yourself)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something without assistance.: A question about whether an individual is able to prepare meals for themselves.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something without assistance.
A question about whether an individual is able to prepare meals for themselves.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that no answer was given.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that no answer was given.
